page.title: 16HACKLINGE AREA RELIGION
page.content:
Religion. Most residents belong to the Church of England, the next highest number are Roman Catholics, then Non-Conformists. Residents of Finglesham and Burgess Green attend Northbourne and those of Worth and Hacklinge go to Worth Parish or Worth Free Church. Ham Church is redundant and Ham is joined with Northbourne. Plans to convert the church to a Stained Glass Window factory are at a standstill.
Customs. The only custom observed is "Beating the Bounds" at Finglesham. This takes place five weeks after Easter on Roga- tion Sunday. It was originally intended to help the younger folk to memorize the Parish boundaries.
